Users.bio: As a graduate from Freed-Hardeman University, I managed all aspects from logistics to program development. My work with local outreach events involved coordinating volunteers, securing resources, and building relationships with community partners. These experiences honed my leadership, organizational, and communication skills.

With a background in social work and a passion for grassroots movements, I have successfully led multiple community engagement initiatives. My focus is on fostering partnerships that create lasting impact.
I have dedicated my career to mentoring young individuals through faith-based initiatives, organizing retreats, and developing youth leadership programs.
Bringing over a decade of experience in volunteer management, I specialize in recruitment, training, and program development to maximize community impact.
As a strategic leader in nonprofit program development, I have overseen multiple initiatives focused on education, economic development, and social services.
